description: A delicious couscous with creamy and salty feta and a lightly roasted sweet potato.
name: Pearl Couscous with Sweet Potato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small white onion, peeled and diced
100g sweet potato, peeled and chopped into bite size

recipeInstructions.text: Place the couscous and 400ml of the vegetable stock in a pot and bring to the boil, allow to simmer for 25 minutes.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with 1 tbs of sesame oil and fry the chopped sweet potato for 8 minutes.
Add the rest of the oil to the pan and fry the garlic and onion for 6 minutes.
Add the pearl couscous and cook out for 10 more minutes.
Incrementally add the rest of the vegetable stock when need to loosen up the couscous and keep cooking for 5 more minutes.
Once the couscous is cooked, remove from the heat and serve with crumbled feta to garnish.
